attributes.action: Resign from his position and call a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The poeple of this country have no confidence in its Prime minister or his government. They have squandered ten years in power and the country is now on its knees and in a state of paralysis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
